Strength.name: Strength
Strength.desc: Strength measures bodily power, athletic training, and the extent to which you can exert raw physical force.

Dexterity.name: Dexterity
Dexterity.desc: Dexterity measures agility, reflexes, and balance.

Constitution.name: Constitution
Constitution.desc: Constitution measures health, stamina, and vital force.

Intelligence.name: Intelligence
Intelligence.desc: Intelligence measures mental acuity, accuracy of recall, and the ability to reason.

Wisdom.name: Wisdom
Wisdom.desc: Wisdom reflects how attuned you are to the world around you and represents perceptiveness and intuition.

Charisma.name: Charisma
Charisma.desc: Charisma measures your ability to interact effectively with others.
